name: Daily Card Pairs
description:
“Daily Card Pairs” is one of the funniest card pairs Training Game. Let's exercise our Brain Now!

Pretty Animals, Fresh vegetable and mystical Monsters help you training. "Daily Card Pairs" will provide hours of fun and addictive gameplay to you. Simple concept, but Plentiful funny. More mechanism, More Challenge, Let's Training Now!

Objectives:
Touch your screen to open block. Try to find all the same block as little time as you can.

Features:
-High-quality sound effects and nice graphic
-User-friendly interface
-Three Levels: Easy Level, Normal Level & Hard Level
-Easy control on Mobile Side
